Cant recommend this game enough, possibly the best story game that I have played.

Similar to what I typed for my Bioshock review, this is still one of the best games ever made.

The game is 8 years old so no, I won't be going into detail. Everything that can be and should be said about this game has already been said.

I completed this many years ago. I sunk loads of hours into playing for fun and getting all the achievements. Back then, I found the gameplay extremely fun and a huge step up from Bioshock. With the story included, this game was mind-blowingly good. Recently, I started and completed this again and it's still an amazing game.

This is that rare type of game that when I scrolled through the negative reviews, I was literally puzzled by the "criticism", it's like I've experienced a different game altogether from what they've typed about. Here's some examples to laugh at:

* "Ripped off Call Of Duty" - I literally can't even understand this take at all.
* "story that doesn't make any sense" - In otherwords these authors didn't understand the straight forward plot and/or the concepts that drives the plot.
* "It isn't Bioshock" - Surprising eh? two different games are... different.
* "bad mouse settings" - Then bind the controls to whatever you want...(?)

Sadly, delusions such as these are common place and liter all Steam review sections for all games so I suggest that you ignore these nonsensical quotes and "reviews" that share similar sentiments.

Don't get me wrong, everything is subjective when it comes to the question of "is this game good enough for you to recommend?" - I get that. I've just never seen so much dishonesty and/or irrelevance before in reviews since I read the review section for Divinity: Original Sin. The same could be said about what I'm typing sure, that's cool. I'd disagree - obviously - as I'm typing this as a warning to new comers > take what I have typed and what others have typed with a pinch of salt.

I'd also suggest that you definitely skip reviews that have less than 12 hours of play time i.e. a fair amount of time for a person to complete the game (depending on difficulty).

Abi detaylı bir inceleme yapamam size ama şunu söyleyebilirim ki bu oyun gerçekten oynadığım en iyi oyunlardan birisi. Öncelikle çok da ileri düzey bir ingilizcem yok ama oynarken gram umursamadım ve inanılmaz eğlendim. Kesinlikle oyunun sanat tasarımı görüp görebileceğiniz en üst seviyede. Öyle güzel mekanlarda bulunuyor, fight'a giriyorsunuz ki... Oyunun özellikte son bölümleri gerçekten çitayı olduğundan daha da yukarı çıkardı. Bu oyunu alabiliyorsanız direkt alın, alamıyorsanız da indirimine ne zaman gireceğini takip edip alın ve kesinlikle oynayın. Şimdi sırada diğer bioshock oyunları ve dlcleri oynamak kaldı.
